snippet.title: Totem Destroyer 2 Full Game Walkthrough (All Levels)
snippet.description:
Totem destroyer 2
About game:- This game is all about to destroy totem blocks. It is so exciting game, here we need to balance the given yellow coloured toy and make it fall on the black coloured block, if the toy fall on the ground you will be out. We have all over 20 levels in this whole game, here you have the toy above the totem blocks we should destroy the blocks by the given black coloured bomb,we should destroy all the totem blocks in such a way that the yellow toy should fall on black coloured blocks not on ground.

Overview:- This is an second season of Totem destroyer named as Totem destroyer 2.
Here in this season we have more number of totems,and we should destroy all of them and make the toy to fall on black coloured block,if else the toy falls on ground we lose. Here all the levels are randomly assigned one after another. This game is so developed and fabulously animated.

Gameplay:- Here we have a black coloured bomb to which we drag and place at any point on the totem blocks and blast it, so the toy falls on the black block and we win the game. Here we have wooden blocks and rubber like red and green blocks,in few levels we have more than one toys.

Connect Us With Facebook :- https://goo.gl/nG8XAC
Connect Us With Twitter :- https://twitter.com/FlashGamesShow
